            <div id="ctl00_cphEventWebsite_ctl00_cphEventWebsite_efSummaryPanel">
	<div id="ctl00_cphEventWebsite_efSummary" isvisible="True">
		
                <span id="ctl00_cphEventWebsite_lblSummary"><p><font size="2"><strong><font color="#000000">The conference will cover customer requirements and supplier strategies for achieving global fuel economy standards, focusing on the real-world issues of product deliverability, quality and cost for all members of the supply chain.</font></strong></font></p>
<p><a       href="http://www.plasticsnews.com/"><em>Plastics News</em></a> is pleased to present its second annual <strong>Plastics in Lightweight Vehicles </strong>event in North America. <em>PN</em> will be hosting a conference and exhibits Nov. 6-7. Due to the great success of collocation last year, <em>PN</em> is partnering with <strong>SPE&rsquo;s Automotive Division</strong>, which will hold its annual<a       href="http://www.speautomotive.com/inno.htm"> Automotive Innovation Awards Competition &amp; Gala</a> on Nov. 7.</p>
<p>On Nov. 6-7, presenters will cover key market and technical information, including the role plastics can play in interiors, seating, structural powertrain and under-the-hood components. Plastics also play a key role in electrification, battery and hybrid technology.<br>
<br>
<font size="2"><strong><font color="#000000"><img style="" src="https://www.regonline.com/custImages/302288/PLV_2012/PLV12_Spkrs_100112_sq.jpg"></font></strong></font><br>
Meanwhile, SPE&rsquo;s Automotive Division will host its 42<sup>nd</sup> annual awards gala on the evening of Nov. 7. The program is the oldest and largest competition of its kind in the automotive and plastics industries, and draws more than 600 attendees from around the world. The group&rsquo;s board members include officials from Ford Motor Co. and Chrysler LLC, and its committee chairs include officials from Ticona Engineering Polymers and Marubeni USA. Last year, SPE recognized many plastics processors, material suppliers and mold suppliers. See the winners <a       href="http://www.speautomotive.com/inno.htm" target="_blank">here</a>.<br>
<strong><br>
WHO SHOULD ATTEND?</strong><strong><br>
</strong>The U.S. government has aggressive new CAFE mileage standard goals. This conference assesses the fast-changing area of vehicle lightweighting from multiple perspectives. Target attendees include officials from all parts of the supply chain, including senior executives and technical leaders as well as designers, brand managers and other key job functions.<br>
<br>
<font size="2"><strong><font color="#000000"><img style="" src="https://www.regonline.com/custImages/302288/PLV_2012/Vote2.jpg"></font></strong></font></p>

    var editMode = false;

    function URLDecode( encoded )
    {
       // Replace + with ' '
       // Replace %xx with equivalent character
       // Put [ERROR] in output if %xx is invalid.
       var HEXCHARS = "0123456789ABCDEFabcdef"; 
       var plaintext = "";
       var i = 0;
       while (i < encoded.length) {
           var ch = encoded.charAt(i);
           if (ch == "+") {
               plaintext += " ";
               i++;
           } else if (ch == "%") {
                if (i < (encoded.length-2) 
                        && HEXCHARS.indexOf(encoded.charAt(i+1)) != -1 
                        && HEXCHARS.indexOf(encoded.charAt(i+2)) != -1 ) {
                    plaintext += unescape( encoded.substr(i,3) );
                    i += 3;
                } else {
                    alert( 'Bad escape combination near ...' + encoded.substr(i) );
                    plaintext += "%[ERROR]";
                    i++;
                }
            } else {
               plaintext += ch;
               i++;
            }
        } // while
       return plaintext;
    }

    function getRegtypeId()
    {
        retVal = "";
        if(typeof(regTypeControlType)!="undefined")
        {
            if(regTypeControlType == "1")
            {
                obj = document.getElementById(regTypeControlNameId);
                if(obj)
                    retVal = "&selRegTypeID="+ obj.options[obj.selectedIndex].value;
            }
            else if(regTypeControlType == "2")
            {
                for (i = 0; i <regTypeControlCount; i++) {
                    obj = document.getElementById(regTypeControlNameId + "_" + i);
                    if(obj && obj.checked)
                        retVal ="&selRegTypeID="+ obj.value;
                    
                }
            }
            else
                retVal = "";
        }
        return retVal;
    }
    function setEditSrc(){
        if (parent.frames.length != 0) {
            var sPath = window.location.pathname;
            var sPage = sPath.substring(sPath.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);

            if (hdnSiteUrl)

                    $('#siteNav a').attr('href', alert);
                }
                document.getElementById('aRegBtn').href = alert;
            }
        }
    }
